# Image Gallery

## Research Images

Add your research images here. You can organize them by project, theme, or chronologically.

### Example Image Section

To add images, use the following syntax:

```markdown
![Image caption](path/to/image.jpg)
```

You can also use HTML for more control:

```html
<img src="path/to/image.jpg" alt="Description" width="600">
```

## Field Work Photos

Add photos from your field work.

## Lab Photos

Add photos from your laboratory work.

---

*This page is customizable. Edit the `gallery.qmd` file and add your images to the repository. Create an `images/` folder to store your image files.*
